author: Tero Laxström <tero.laxstrom@visit.fi>
name: angular-image-mask
description: angular-image-mask - An AngularJS directive to draw paths and masks over an image

scripts.build: npm run build:jshint -s && npm run build:browserify -s && npm run build:templates -s
scripts.build:examples: npm run build -s && npm run build:examples-copy -s && npm run build:examples-libs -s
scripts.build:examples-copy: cp -a examples dist/ && cp dist/angular-image-mask.js dist/examples/ && cp -a templates dist/examples/
